text: The 1984–85 Algerian Championnat National was the 23rd season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 20 teams contested the league, with GCR Mascara as the defending champions, The Championnat started on September 31, 1984 and ended on May 26, 1985. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1984-1985 * IRB Relizane * ISM Aïn Béïda * JH Djazaïr Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1985-1986 * MP Alger * RS Kouba * JCM Tiaret ==League table== ==References== ==External links== *1984–85 Algerian Championnat National Algerian Championnat National Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons
title: 1984–85 Algerian Championnat National
